  • Edit on GitHub

cospar.hf.save_preprocessed_adata¶

cospar.hf.save_preprocessed_adata(adata, data_des='')¶

Save preprocessed adata.

It will remove un-needed entries, and use the default key to save the results if a new data_des is not provided.
